name: mouse-game
description: A simple game for LG Smart TV: a cat chases the Magic Remote pointer. Use the pointer on TV or your mouse on Mac.

scripts.stage: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp appinfo.json index.html style.css icon.png dist/ && cp -r assets dist/assets && cp bundle.js dist/bundle.js
scripts.deploy:tv: npm run build && npm run package && npm run install:tv && npm run launch:tv
scripts.deploy:sim: npm run build && npm run package && npm run install:sim && npm run launch:sim
